author: bsunanda
body:
### PR description:

Update the codes which make more meaningful comparisons between G4 and GV

#### PR validation:

Tested in the context where Geant4 results are compared with GeantV results

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No back porting is needed. The code is kept for a futuristic use if we take a GeantV like approach in future.
title: Run3-sim34 Update the codes which make more meaningful comparisons between G4 and GV
